data.text: As per Shaun he discussed this with Lungisa in the week and Lungisa advised him he's not done with this yet, however Shaun tested this again now as dev wanted feedback from us and it's still not working. I am moving this log to On Hold. @stefanbar @cobuspienaar @jakovanrensburg @shaunviljoen

card.name: VW - Unable to buy credits on Vaultworks
